command.value: @concat('.ingest inline into table Temp_CIS_Metadata_Task with(format="json", ingestionMapping = "[{\"column\":\"TaskId\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.TaskId\"}},{\"column\":\"JobId\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.JobId\"}},{\"column\":\"TaskName\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.TaskName\"}},{\"column\":\"DisplayName\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.DisplayName\"}},{\"column\":\"ExternalId\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.ExternalId\"}},{\"column\":\"ExternalSystemType\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.ExternalSystemType\"}},{\"column\":\"Component\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.Component\"}},{\"column\":\"OrderId\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.OrderId\"}},{\"column\":\"CreatedDate\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.CreatedDate\"}},{\"column\":\"StartDate\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.StartDate\"}},{\"column\":\"FinishDate\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.FinishDate\"}},{\"column\":\"StateName\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.StateName\"}},{\"column\":\"CustomState\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.CustomState\"}},{\"column\":\"TaskType\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.TaskType\"}},{\"column\":\"AssignedTo\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.AssignedTo\"}},{\"column\":\"LastBlockedReason\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.LastBlockedReason\"}},{\"column\":\"Timestamp\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.Timestamp\"}},{\"column\":\"StartWaitingDate\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.StartWaitingDate\"}},{\"column\":\"FinishWaitingDate\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.FinishWaitingDate\"}},{\"column\":\"TaskGroupPath\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.TaskGroupPath\"}},{\"column\":\"Notes\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.Notes\"}},{\"column\":\"OwningTeamId\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.OwningTeamId\"}},{\"column\":\"ProgressInfo\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.ProgressInfo\"}},{\"column\":\"LogUri\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.LogUri\"}},{\"column\":\"ProgressReportLink\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.ProgressReportLink\"}},{\"column\":\"IngestionTime\", \"Properties\":{\"Path\":\"$.IngestionTime\"}}]") <| ', item())
